definition: common/general/to share/together/total/altogether/abbr. for 共產黨|共产党[Gong4 chan3 dang3], Communist party
and/together with/with/sum/union/peace/harmony/Taiwan pr. [han4] when it means "and" or "with"
to combine a powdery substance (flour, plaster etc) with water/Taiwan pr. [huo4]
to complete a set in mahjong or playing cards
to compose a poem in reply (to sb's poem) using the same rhyme sequence/to join in the singing/to chime in with others
to mix (ingredients) together/to blend/classifier for rinses of clothes/classifier for boilings of medicinal herbs

pinyin: Zhong1 hua2 Ren2 min2 Gong4 he2 guo2
Ai4 er3 lan2 Gong4 he2 jun1
Duo1 mi3 ni2 jia1 Gong4 he2 guo2

definition: Gonghe county in Hainan Tibetan autonomous prefecture 海南藏族自治州[Hai3 nan2 Zang4 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Qinghai

pinyin: Zhong1 hua2 Su1 wei2 ai1 Gong4 he2 guo2
Ke4 luo2 di4 ya4 Gong4 he2 guo2
Gang1 guo3 Min2 zhu3 Gong4 he2 guo2
Ji1 li3 ba1 si1 Gong4 he2 guo2

sentences.english: It was bound for the Russian Republic of Dagestan in the North Caucasus.
sentences.chinese: 該飛機飛往北高加索地區的達吉斯坦俄羅斯共和國。

sentences.english: The slides show taxes paying form of tax system of Republic of Uzbekistan.
sentences.chinese: 幻燈片提供的是烏茲別克斯坦共和國稅務系統納稅表。

sentences.english: Both factions field armies from the Roman Republic.
sentences.chinese: 兩派都派出了羅馬共和國軍隊。

sentences.english: And Republican leaders say that they agree we must avoid default.
sentences.chinese: 共和黨領導人說，他們同意我們必須避免債務欠付。
佛羅倫薩曾是一個共和國。

sentences.english: When you have PDR , abnormal blood vessels grow in the retina.
sentences.chinese: 當你有民主共和國，異常血管生長在視網膜。

sentences.english: As a constitutional federal republic, the United States is not unique.
sentences.chinese: 美國的憲政民主共和制並不獨特。

sentences.english: 1910 - Portugal overthrows its monarchy and declares itself a republic.
sentences.chinese: 1910年的今天，葡萄牙推翻君主制宣佈共和。

sentences.english: The third newcomer -- the United States -- based itself squarely on republican principles.
sentences.chinese: 第三個國家便是美國，它完全建立在共和準繩基礎上。

sentences.english: The Bolivarian leader's vaunted popularity tumbles.
sentences.chinese: 委內瑞拉玻利瓦爾共和國領導人所吹噓的聲望猛跌。

sentences.english: The territory of the modern Republic of Macedonia became a part of the Province or Banate of Vardar (Vardarska Banovina 1).
sentences.chinese: 馬其頓共和國的領土變成Vardar省的一部分。

sentences.english: Montenegro is one of the non-EU states which uses the euro.
sentences.chinese: 黑山共和國是一個非歐盟成員國使用歐元的國家。

sentences.english: But then again, I have had a hard time understanding the G. O. P. for a while now.
sentences.chinese: 不過，老實說，我早已不明白共和黨究竟在幹什麼。

sentences.english: Do not forget those who have been wrongfully accused by the Republic and died refusing to close their eyes.
sentences.chinese: 不要忘記那些被共和國誣衊而死不瞑目的人們。

sentences.english: Criteria of Seawater Quality of the P. C. C.
sentences.chinese: 中華人民共和國海水水質標準。

sentences.english: The left-leaning La Repubblica said it was a "reckless comment."
sentences.chinese: 左翼的《共和報》稱這是“魯莽的言論”。

definition: democracy/civil liberties/principle of democracy, the second of Dr Sun Yat-sen's 孫中山|孙中山 Three Principles of the People 三民主義|三民主义 (at the time, meaning widespread popular involvement in affairs of state)
Dr Sun Yat-sen's 孫中山|孙中山 Three Principles of the People (late 1890s)
Minquan county in Shangqiu 商丘[Shang1 qiu1], Henan
